text: The Art of War is a 2000 American Canadian action spy movie directed by Christian Duguay and starring Wesley Snipes, Donald Sutherland, Anne Archer, Maury Chaykin, Ron Yuan, Michael Biehn, Marie Matiko, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * Category:2000 action movies Category:2000s spy movies Category:American action movies Category:American spy movies Category:Canadian action movies Category:Movies directed by Christian Duguay Category:Movies about the United Nations Category:Movies set in Hong Kong Category:Movies set in Montreal Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: The Art of War (movie)
